replies.body: That is a jewel (x2) you can use to upgrade the new team icons, per our [Worlds 2016](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) guide.  You'll find a calendar that will pinpoint game days, which is when you'll be able to buy some for IP instead of through the championship chests.  I hope that helps clear things up!
